name: clark-pack
description: Bootstrapping my repo with files and configurations I always use, intended for personal use!

scripts.docs: npx documentation build src/** -f md > README[sample].md
scripts.html: npx documentation build src/** -f html -o docs
scripts.release: standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish

author: clickwithclark <clickwithclark@gmail.com>
